Streamline your job application tracking with one click.

In one click, 
- We log your job applications to a custom google sheets for you
- Keep track and update application status automatically(on google sheets and popup)

No more 
- Manual entry to excel/sheeets
- Manual update to excel/sheeets

We also show your current application stats in a bar graph for easier visual grasp on your current status.

Save time throughout your job application journey with Tacer!
